inclusion.criterion: The patient has provided written informed consent prior to any study-related procedure.
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Patient text does not explicitly mention this, but it is implied by the context.

inclusion.criterion: The patient is at least 18 years of age and equal to or below 70 years.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The patient has a present diagnosis of AA or secondary GBM.
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Patient has anaplastic astrocytoma (AA) of the spine.

inclusion.criterion: The lesion (or sum of lesions) does not exceed 50 ccm in volume (central MRI review).
inclusion.label: unknown
inclusion.evidence: No specific information about tumor size is provided.

inclusion.criterion: All patients have recurrent or refractory disease, i.e. disease has progressed after prior surgery and radiotherapy at any time of the disease course or stage.
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Patient's tumor is unresectable and has progressed despite radiation.

inclusion.criterion: The patient is eligible for chemotherapy.
inclusion.label: unknown
inclusion.evidence: No specific information about chemotherapy eligibility is provided.

inclusion.criterion: The patient is on a maximum dose of 4 mg/day dexamethasone or equivalent doses for other corticosteroids, which has been stable or decreasing for at least 3 weeks prior to Screening.
inclusion.label: unknown
inclusion.evidence: Patient is taking high-dose steroids, but no specific information about dosage or duration is provided.

inclusion.criterion: The patient is male or a non-pregnant, non-lactating female.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Females of childbearing potential must have a negative beta-HCG pregnancy test at Screening.
inclusion.label: unknown
inclusion.evidence: No specific information about patient's reproductive status or pregnancy test results is provided.

inclusion.criterion: The patient has recovered from acute toxicity caused by any previous therapy.
inclusion.label: unknown
inclusion.evidence: Patient has experienced severe side effects, but no specific information about recovery is provided.

inclusion.criterion: The patient has a life expectancy of at least 3 months.
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Patient's condition is terminal, implying a short life expectancy.

inclusion.criterion: The patient has a Karnofsky Performance Status of at least 70%.
inclusion.label: unknown
inclusion.evidence: No specific information about patient's performance status is provided.

exclusion.criterion: Patient unable or not willing to comply with the protocol regulations.
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger
exclusion.evidence: Patient text does not suggest any unwillingness to comply.

exclusion.criterion: The investigator deems it necessary to surgically (re-)resect the present tumor.
exclusion.label: unknown
exclusion.evidence: No specific information about surgical plans is provided.

exclusion.criterion: Tumor surgery, tumor debulking, or other neurosurgery within 3 months prior to randomization.
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger
exclusion.evidence: Patient's tumor is unresectable and has been treated with radiation.

exclusion.criterion: Radiotherapy or stereotactic (gamma knife) radiosurgery within 3 months prior to randomization.
exclusion.label: met
exclusion.evidence: Patient has received radiation therapy, but it was more than 3 months ago.

exclusion.criterion: Prior interstitial brachytherapy of the brain with permanent implants.
exclusion.label: unknown
exclusion.evidence: No specific information about patient's treatment history is provided.

exclusion.criterion: Chemotherapy, hormone therapy, or any other therapy with established or suggested anti-tumor effects within 4 weeks (nitrosoureas: 6 weeks) prior to randomization.
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger
exclusion.evidence: Patient has received chemotherapy, but it was more than 4 weeks ago.

exclusion.label: unknown
exclusion.evidence: No specific information about patient's treatment history is provided.

notes: Patient has a complex medical history, including severe side effects from previous treatments. Specific information about some inclusion and exclusion criteria is lacking or unclear.
